title: Plant Growth: Auxins and Gibberellins | Plants | Biology | FuseSchool

tasks.task: Understanding plant growth hormones and tropisms
subtasks: Explain the role of auxin in stem phototropism
Describe the effect of auxin concentration on root growth
Explain the mechanism of root geotropism and auxin distribution
Describe stem geotropism and the role of auxin in counteracting gravity
Identify the role of cytokinins in seed germination and energy provision
Understand the interaction between gibberellins and auxins in stem elongation
